definition: Attributes that specify quantifiable properties or dimensions being measured in objects or processes.

positive_examples: The length of the table is 6 feet.
Her running speed was quite impressive today.
The width of the doorway needs to be measured.
The car's acceleration rate exceeded expectations.
We need to check the height clearance here.
The volume of this container is 2 liters.
negative_examples: The table is made of oak wood.
She ran gracefully through the park.
The red door stood wide open.
The car belongs to my neighbor.
We walked towards the tall building.
This container holds my favorite snacks.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: QualitativeAttribute, TemporalAttribute, SpatialAttribute, InherentAttribute
